name: Sentiment Analysis
description: Sentiment Analysis is the task of interpreting and classifying emotions (positive or negative) in the input text.
expected_inputs: The task expects an input sentence.
expected_outputs: The probability of the sentiment being positive/negative.

examples.sentence: a very well-made, funny and entertaining picture.
so unremittingly awful that labeling it a dog probably constitutes cruelty to canines
all the amped up tony hawk style stunts and thrashing rap-metal can't disguise the fact that, really, we've been here, done that.

visually imaginative, thematically instructive and thoroughly delightful, it takes us on a roller-coaster ride from innocence to experience without even a hint of that typical kiddie-flick sentimentality.
